TopicTitle: Vic Viper Replica - the hero ship from "Gradius"

Articles.Content:
Hi there, once again I bring you something a bit nostalgic. After one year, This is my second attempt.

Vic Viper

=Gradius V incarnation=

This is one of my favorite version of Vic Viper. 

![2umUBNS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2umUBNS.jpg)

My replica is actually combination between Gradius V and Gradius II, to keep thing simple and low parts count.

![jKydpbR.png](http://i.imgur.com/jKydpbR.png)

![1XrqZqQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/1XrqZqQ.png)

![4M5uq5y.png](http://i.imgur.com/4M5uq5y.png)

![vIaHkqf.png](http://i.imgur.com/vIaHkqf.png)

Download: [http://www./download/1ck3u6rbzi57xb7/Vic_Viper.craft](http://www./download/1ck3u6rbzi57xb7/Vic_Viper.craft)

It's a little tricky to balance the forward wing but I solved it in the end.

=S.G. incarnation=

While I rather not talk about this incarnation, The design itself is quite good. It's stand out among other incarnation of Vic Viper.

![WaYAVqY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/WaYAVqY.jpg)

![QALLn95.png](http://i.imgur.com/QALLn95.png)

Download:http://www./download/bfifi2x56bcjb4d/Vic_Viper_SG.craft[http://www./download/bfifi2x56bcjb4d/Vic_Viper_SG.craft](http://www./download/bfifi2x56bcjb4d/Vic_Viper_SG.craft)

Oh my ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Gradius ! TOO MUCH !

Excellent , i love those replica ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) ! What about U.N.Squadron or DonPachi ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Oh my ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Gradius ! TOO MUCH !
> Excellent , i love those replica ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) ! What about U.N.Squadron or DonPachi ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm glad you like it. It was a lot of fun and rewarding making these replica ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). 

It's going to take me a long time to complete other ship from other series ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif).

DonPachi is nice idea...or Raiden....hmm....may be R-type...There are too many of them ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).
